thread.title: Clemson linebacker gets tattoo to stick it to ESPN analyst (3 Photos)
thread.title_full: Clemson linebacker gets tattoo to stick it to ESPN analyst (3 Photos)

author: Chase
title: Clemson linebacker gets tattoo to stick it to ESPN analyst (3 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Ben Boulware was the vocal and physical leader of the National Championship winning Clemson Tigers football team this past season. The middle linebacker was quite literally the center of the team, and could be seen everywhere on the field making tackles and motivating his teammates. He is notorious for playing with a chip on his shoulder and always going the extra mile to stick it to his opponents. 2 
So when ESPN analyst Desmond Howard had some critical words about the Clemson linebackers, Boulware made sure that he proved him wrong. And when the Tigers and Boulware did, the fiery linebacker went the extra mile to make sure Howard would never forget. 3 . @DesmondHoward remember saying this? was thinking of a place to put my National Championship tattoo and what better place than my achillesüòè pic.twitter.com/LQqBMrwW3l ‚Äî Ben Boulware (@benboulware7) January 17, 2017 
Quite a literal tattoo by Boulware. Let‚Äôs hope no one ever calls him a prima donna.
